reference.title: javaPackageRef
reference.shortdesc: This element provides a Java package topic type as a link in a DITA map.

section.title: Description
section.p: A <javaPackageRef > can contain other <javaPackageRef > elements, allowing you to express navigation or table-of-contents hierarchies, as well as implying relationships between the containing <javaClassRef>, <javaInterface>, <javaException> and <javaError> elements and its children.

refbody.example:
ExampleClick on the following link to open the Java API topic type example in
<javaPackageRef navtitle="Package com.ibm.xtools.patterns.framework.uml2" href="com.ibm.xtools.patterns.framework.uml2.dita" locktitle="yes"> <javaClassRef navtitle="UmlnotationPlugin.Implementation Class" href="UmlnotationPlugin.Implementation.dita"> </javaClassRef> <javaClassRef navtitle="UMLDiagramResourceUti Class" href="UMLDiagramResourceUtil.dita"> </javaClassRef> </javaPackageRef>
